body_html: @ispirmustafa is correct, and in various runs I have never encountered any slowness. Because you're not providing any vocabulary information, the relevant logic is contained entirely in init_from_checkpoint (which you mentioned you saw when directly using it). And the underlying logic there simply overrides the initialization op, which should only occur once. Will loop in the author of init_from_checkpoint.
